abstract.description:
Simulated dataset GluGluToHToZZTo4L_M-550_7TeV-minloHJJ-pythia6-tauola in AODSIM format for 2011 collision data (SM Higgs)

See the description of the simulated dataset names in: About CMS simulated dataset names.

These simulated datasets correspond to the collision data collected by the CMS experiment in 2011.

methodology.description: These data were generated in several steps (see also CMS Monte Carlo production overview):

configuration_files.title: Configuration file for LHE step HIG-Summer11pLHE-00118_1_cfg.py

steps.note: To get the exact generator parameters, please see Finding the generator parameters.

configuration_files.title: Configuration file for SIM step HIG-Summer11Leg-00197_1_cfg.py
Configuration file for HLT step HIG-Summer11LegDR-00204_1_cfg.py
Configuration file for RECO step HIG-Summer11LegDR-00204_2_cfg.py

pileup.description: To make these simulated data comparable with the collision data, pile-up events are added to the simulated event in this step.
